website_summaries.verdict: A comfortably priced, black gas cooktop featuring 4 sealed burners with continuous grates.
pros: Other than this cooktop's power boil feature, it is basically a no-frills model that just does what it is designed to do: it cooks your food
It is important to point out that the care taken with packaging this cooktop helps to ensure that it arrives undamaged
cons: The cast iron cooking grates lack a heft which would give you more confidence in their durability

customer_reviews.title: GE Stovetop Grate Top are poor quality. Very thin and can easily crack.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the GE Stovetop. The only thing bad I see is the top grates are Very Cheap quality. Very thin cast metal. They should’ve made a thicker gauge GRATE. When you are cooking with heavy pots. GE is cutting corners.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dalliegro  III

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean... Large burner gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: Well packed. Delivered intact. Quick install... though I had to go buy a couple extra fittings, as well as the new flex, to connect with our old gas line. Very easy to keep clean. Large burner gets very hot, so adjacent counter surface might suffer; already slightly dulled.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D Evans

customer_reviews.title: Oils stains difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.text: On my old stovetop, I could use any brand degreaser to remove oil stains easily without have to use much elbow grease. However, with this new stovetop, the degreaser that work perfectly with my other stovetop no longer gets the job done. I had to buy some expensive stovetop cleaner which is the only thing that will get the oil stains out of the black stovetop. If it was easier to clean, I would give it 5 stars. Besides that, installation was easy and everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good price, be cautious with size and pipe connection below fits your configuration.
customer_reviews.text: Best price, but design has some flaws.. however the cut length was larger than my prior GE unit, so had to cut half inch more from my counter. The pipe connection comes underneath the unit and not quite in a corner, so it was obstructing the cabinet drawers below from sliding. Had to cut drawer size to accommodate. The gas flow seem to be large than my previous unit, however the grates are little too tall from the flames so cooking time is more than my previous GE unit.
customer_reviews.author: jollyguy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stove
customer_reviews.text: They wanted $700 for this at Home Depot and bestbuy. I thought it was going to be a cheap model but I’ve had it for 5 months and no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more for stainless steel color instead
customer_reviews.text: Better if ordered in stainless steel. Pay a little more for stainless color. Black just looks very cheap for some reason. I absolutely hate it. But it’s already installed and it’ll be a hassle to remove it. It works fine, just doesn’t look nice
customer_reviews.author: Lance GYW

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. It doesn't have some of the bells and whistles of the newer ones, but it's half the price! It works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: great purchase came before delivery date easy install looks and cooks great
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: The fire power is weak. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product. It worked. Next day it doesn’t work as good as the first time. The flame is too weak. I had to return the item. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Yeahya Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this new gas cooktop. It is very durable and I love the way it looks. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean except for burner covers. Excellent differences in heat settings. Overall very pleased with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The gide is too big Needed an adaptor Good flam
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru G.

customer_reviews.title: Value was the most important factor to get this product
customer_reviews.text: I saved almost 50% for the same product compared with other retail stores. The replace was very smooth and look nice
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was easy. The product arrived on time and in perfect condition. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: corry

customer_reviews.title: easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: I was given the wrong info and ordered this gas range, should have been electric. Switched it out no troubles.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep clean. Has an oily film that just doesn't seem to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Rick  J. Croel

product_meta.description: 30 Inch Gas Cooktop with MAX Burner System, Power Broil Burner, Simmer Burner, Continuous Grates, Sealed Burners and ADA Compliant.
